entry.name: .find
entry.description: Find all or check for descendants that match the provided selector or element(s)

argument.name: comparison
argument.description: The selector or element(s) to compare descendants to. If it's an array-like or zQuery object, only one element in the object must match for it to count as a match.

argument.name: selectorWithExclamation
argument.description: A string that contains a selector and the exclamation mark (!) as its first character. This checks if all descendants match the selector.

argument.name: selectorWithQuestion
argument.description: A string that contains a selector and the question mark (?) as its first character. This checks if at least one descendant matches the selector.

returns.return: A new zQuery instance containing the matching descendants
A boolean that is `true` if all/some descendants match and `false` otherwise
